CustomField.description: Field that will be filled with the URL to the report corresponding to the GDRs of the current Archive Process
CustomField.formula: IF (NOT(ISBLANK(grax__Archive_Process_Monitoring_Report_Id__c)), IF(NOT($User.UIThemeDisplayed="Theme4d"), HYPERLINK('/' & grax__Archive_Process_Monitoring_Report_Id__c & '?pv0=' & Name, "Archive Process Monitoring Report Link","_blank"), HYPERLINK('/lightning/r/Report/' & grax__Archive_Process_Monitoring_Report_Id__c & '/view?fv0=' & Name, "Archive Process Monitoring Report Link","_blank")), '')
CustomField.label: Archive Process Monitoring Report Link
